projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: ChatterBox -  Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- A Chat application  made using React , Node.js where a person can chat with community of people who are using this application
 - Secure login with full **authentication**.
 - Instant messaging with **real-time notifications**

projects.title: Travel and Toursim ChatBot
projects.bodyText:
- Assisted users with vacation planning through smart chat interaction.
 - Provided destination suggestions based on user preferences or through the dataset.
 - Enhanced user experience by simplifying travel queries.

projects.title: Movie Recommender System
projects.bodyText:
- A Movie Recommender System built using **Flask** for the backend and **React** for the frontend.
 - Utilizes a machine learning model trained on Data Set
 - Uses pandas, numpy, and scikit-learn for data processing and ML algorithms

projects.title: AI Calculator Application
projects.bodyText:
- The AI-Powered Calculator is a smart and interactive application that allows users to perform both basic and complex mathematical calculations using hand-drawn inputs.
 - utilizes Google's **Gemini API** to recognize drawn patterns.

projects.title: Quiz App
projects.bodyText:
- Quiz Application which was build with React.
 - uses an API that contains some basic kind of quiz questions.
 - user can select options and score will be allocated for them

projects.title: Shape matcher game
projects.bodyText:
- Shape Matcher is an engaging and fun game where players drag and drop falling shapes into their respective boxes.
 - The game challenges players to think quickly and accurately to match shapes, score points, and avoid penalties.

projects.title: Currency Converter
projects.bodyText:
- An Application which was build by using JavaScript.
 - That eventually converts currency into diiferent country's currency seamlessly

projects.title: Youtube - Clone(Static)
projects.bodyText: - A static Web page that Youtube Home page
